column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Let me make this clear. I am a steak lover
column3: connossieur of sorts you may say. I've been to all of the top steakhouses in New York
column4: which are some of the best anywhere. My standards are extremely high when it comes to beef. After getting a tip from a friend that I hold in very high regard concerning matters of food
column5: I was told this is the best to get the best steak in the city. After eating it
column6: I am hard pressed and happy to say this is one of the best steaks in the country and one of the best I've ever had.
